DOC.brief_summary: This project seek determine efficacy safety education use safe home model . The 4 X 8 ft. model design look like house ; 4 `` room '' focus safety message . Families enrol clinic randomize one two group , safe home model group print safety education material ( TIPP material ) group . The investigator compare retention safety information among caregiver instruct use two method . The hypothesis family safe home model group improve retention safety information .
DOC.brief_title: Home Safety Intervention Using Safe Home Model
DOC.criteria: Caregivers child young 6 year old Language English Spanish
